mapper.sql: id, title, description, config_detail, case_detail, passed, failed, is_delete
mapper.insert: insert into test_suite (title, description, config_detail, case_detail, passed, failed, is_delete) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{configDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{failed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into test_suite
title,
description,
config_detail,

passed,

is_delete,

mapper.update:
update test_suite
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
config_detail = #{configDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
case_detail = #{caseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passed = #{passed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
failed = #{failed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
